title: Provides for reporting of bias-related incidents on state university campuses
summary: Provides for reporting of bias-related incidents on state university campuses by university police officers to college and university personnel; defines "bias-related offenses".

   17  state-operated campus of the state university shall enter into a written
   18  agreement with adjoining law enforcement agencies establishing protocols

   21  not  be deemed to supersede the authority of other police officers.  The
   22  provisions of this paragraph shall not apply to any of the state  insti-

   24  nine of this chapter.  FOR THE PURPOSES OF THIS  SECTION,  "BIAS-RELATED
